attributes.action: Tony Blair should not get a Knighthood. He took the Country into an illegal war.
attributes.additional_details: I want to start this Petition as I believe there is huge support for this amongst ordinary people.
attributes.background: The Queen should not have to grant Tony Blair a Knighthood. This should not stop subsequent Prime Ministers getting Honours if appropriate.

rejection.details: We cannot accept petitions about honours or appointments, including requests for individuals to be given or not given particular honours.
